content: ðŸ“„ Smart Layer is a bridging layer between Web2 and Web3. https://cryptorank.io/ico/smart-token-labs#funding-roundsThey've raised $6 million from Tier 2 funds and have a Twitter following of 68k people. They also have the coveted blue checkmark, and a few prominent influencers.Currently, you can earn points, which will later be exchanged for $SLN tokens. There's an invite system with limitations similar to Arkham (a maximum of 5 referrals per day). They promise to release the token closer to the end of this year, and they're talking about listings on exchanges.ðŸ“– What to do:- In the form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeCsN4RoKpSucGowzgJyS8TQ_jQgC2ErW0SmLRm0QUYf21m2A/viewform?usp=sf_link , write your email address where I should send the invitation.- When I send the invitation- Check your email and register your account.- Feel free to use this translation for sharing the information about Smart Layer and their token rewards.vlad-nemoqqq.medium.com - here you can follow me and learn about more activities in the projects
